contentrichtext.text: {{unref|date=April 2013}} {{About|the band|the Chinese Zodiac animal|Rabbit (zodiac)}} '''Year of the Rabbit''' is a [[rock band]] assembled and fronted by [[Ken Andrews]], formerly of [[Failure (band)|Failure]] and [[ON (music)|ON]]. After the commercial disappointment of ON, Andrews and ON's touring [[drum kit|drummer]] Tim Dow (formerly of [[Shiner (band)|Shiner]] and [[Season to Risk]]) first recruited Dow's friend Jeff Garber (lead guitar/background vocals, formerly of [[National Skyline]] and [[Castor (band)|Castor]]), and Solomon Snyder (bass/background vocals, formerly of Cupcakes and [[Dovetail Joint (band)|Dovetail Joint]]) came onboard shortly thereafter. Whereas ON's material had been created mostly by Andrews as a solo project, the harder-rocking sound of Year of the Rabbit is much closer to that of his previous band, Failure. Their first release, the 2003 EP [[Hunted (album)|''Hunted'']], was made available only from [[CD Baby]], the [[iTunes Store]], and the band themselves. It was enough to attract the attention of [[Elektra Records]], who released their [[Year of the Rabbit (album)|self-titled album]] the following July. Unfortunately for the band, however, Elektra's parent company, [[Warner Music Group]], was sold in February 2004 to a group of private investors, who decided to fold Elektra into [[Atlantic Records]], and many of the labels' underperforming acts, including Year of the Rabbit, were dropped from their rosters. Two months later, Andrews declared on his official website that due to the shakeup at their label, the band had been put on indefinite hiatus. Currently, Andrews is working both as a solo artist and as a member of Los Angeles Digital Noise Academy, as well as being a sought-after [[Record producer|producer]] and [[session musician]]. ==Discography== *''[[Hunted (album)|Hunted]]'' EP (2003) *''[[Year of the Rabbit (album)|Year of the Rabbit]]'' (2003) ==External links== *[http://www.kenandrews.com/ Ken Andrews - official site] {{Ken Andrews}} {{US-rock-band-stub}} [[Category:American rock music groups]]
